author: Simone Kidd
content:
Excellent Hot Tub Hire Company.

Have used DB a few times to hire hot tubs! They are really well priced and so helpful. Always efficient with the paperwork & deliveries. We have the same delivery people each time and they are knowledgeable and friendly. The tub itself has always been clean and in full working condition. Will continue to use them for years to come no doubt!!
